scripts.polly:test: cd packages/core && npx hardhat test test/polly.js
scripts.module:test: cd packages/core && npx hardhat test test/$npm_config_name.js
scripts.module:watch: npx nodemon --watch packages/core/contracts --watch packages/core packages/core/test -e sol,js --exec "npm run polly:test"
scripts.module:compile: cd packages/core && npx hardhat compile contracts/modules/$npm_config_name.sol
